changeFeatureName(String, String) - Method in class mlp.FeatureSet
Changes the current name of the specified feature to a new name, if the specified feature exists and the provided new name is not already a name of an existing feature.
changeNames(Map<String, List<FeatureSet>>, Map<String, String>, Map<String, String>) - Static method in class mlp.LexiconFactory
In the specified lexicon map, this method changes the names of specified features to new names, and also changes the names of the specified Feature-Set names, and return the modified lexicon-map
CharStream - Interface in mlp
This interface describes a character stream that maintains line and column number positions of the characters.
cleanRawTexUnicodeData(String, String) - Static method in class mlp.LatexUnicode
Reads raw Tex-and-Unicode symbols from the specified input file, cleans the data and converts it into a tidy format, and writes the results in the specified file.
cleanRawTexUnicodeData(String) - Static method in class mlp.LatexUnicode

createLexiconMap(Path, String, String, String, String) - Static method in class mlp.LexiconFactory
Reads the contents of the lexicon stored in the file specified by the Path argument, and creates and returns a map, which has one map entry per lexicon entry.

createStructuredUnicodeMathDB(String, String) - Static method in class mlp.LatexUnicode
Reads the input file where each non-header line is of the form: unicode <> TeX command <> source <> description A header line is one that ends with ":" and does not not start with a unicode (u+XXXXX).
createUnicodeMathMap(String) - Static method in class mlp.LatexUnicode
Reads the input file where each non-header line is of the form: unicode <> TeX command <> source <> description A header line is one that ends with ":" and does not not start with a unicode (u+XXXXX).
csv2Map(List<String>) - Static method in class mlp.MlpUtility
Converts a List of comma-separated key-value pairs, one pair per line, into a map with the corresponding keys and values.
